attributes.action: Stop the Bristol Clean Air Zone charge on private vehicles
attributes.additional_details: People should not be forced to buy newer vehicles. It goes against the right to personal liberty, in terms of buying and selling.
attributes.background: Change the zone to a larger area but only for commercial vehicles (option 2 from earlier discussions by the clean air Bristol).

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
